Package io.github.jdbctemplatemapper.core

Class SelectMapper<T>

java.lang.Object
io.github.jdbctemplatemapper.core.SelectMapper<T>
public class SelectMapper<T> extends Object
Allows population of the model from a ResultSet and generating the select columns string for the model. 

 See Querying relationships for more info
Author:
ajoseph

  • Method Details

    • getColumnsSql

      public String getColumnsSql()
      returns a string which can be used in a sql select statement with all the properties which have corresponding database columns. The column aliases will have a prefix of tableAlias concatenated with "_" 
       SelectMapper selectMapper = jdbcTemplateMapper.getSelectMapper(Employee.class, "emp");
 selectMapper.getColumnSql() will return something like below:

 "emp.id as emp_id, emp.last_name as emp_last_name, emp.first_name as emp_first_name"
      Returns:
      comma separated select column string

    • getType

      public Class<?> getType()
      Get the type the SelectMapper is for.
      Returns:
      the type

    • getResultSetModelIdColumnLabel

      public String getResultSetModelIdColumnLabel()

      Returns:
      the column alias of the models id in sql statement

    • buildModel

      public T buildModel(ResultSet rs)
      Builds the model from the resultSet.
      Parameters:
      rs - The ResultSet from which to build the model.
      Returns:
      the model. Will return null if the id property is null (even if other fields have some values)
